title: Bug 124777: Setting a blank tooltip in the chart title causes an exception when previewing
description: When attempting to preview a chart with a blank tooltip in its title, the software generates an exception error.
OB: When previewing a chart with a blank tooltip in the title, the software generates an exception error.
EB: The software should not generate an exception error when previewing a chart with a blank tooltip in the title. It should either display an empty tooltip or handle it gracefully without causing an exception.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new simple chart.
2. Add a title to the chart and enable the 'mouse over/show tooltip' interactivity option.
3. Keep the tooltip text blank.
4. Click the 'Add' button to save the changes.
5. Attempt to preview the chart.
